candidates.reason: Swarm Consensus (3 votes): xai: CleanSpark (CLSK) is another crypto mining play like WULF and MARA, featuring high volatility and strict adherence to Bitcoin's boom/bust cycles, enhanced by its focus on sustainable mining for retail appeal. Shows similar boom/bust cycles to WULF and MARA. Recent price weakness following Bitcoin's consolidation creates mean reversion potential. Mining sector rotation plays well when crypto sentiment shifts.
